metadata.title: CVE-2025-21173 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability: Insecure Temp File Usage AllowsMalicious Package Dependency Injection on Linux. An attacker could exploitthis vulnerability to writing a specially crafted file in the security contextof the local system. This only affects .NET on Linux operating systems.

criterions.comment: dotnet8 package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
